typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		Year as integer,
		Product_Type as string,
		Sales as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SalesSource
SalesSource filter(Year != 2014) ~> Filter2014
Filter2014 aggregate(groupBy(Country,
		Year),
	Sales = sum(Sales)) ~> AggregateYearWise
AggregateYearWise split(Country=='USA',
	Country=='IND',
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitSalesDataOnCountry@(USA, India, Default)
SplitSalesDataOnCountry@USA sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['USASales.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> USA
SplitSalesDataOnCountry@India sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['IndiaSales'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> IndiaSales
SplitSalesDataOnCountry@Default sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['UKSales.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UKSales
